content: Great app with cool features not found on the Hue app. Developer is very responsive and great to deal with.

Bugs (HUE) and no answer from the developer, even after 3 weeks and 2 mails. Seeing how long it's been since this app was updated and other users reporting bugs as well, I can't recommend this app. The bugs I experienced are related to some basic usage concerning the creation of custom scenes/ambiences (to dim or change to certain colors etc). There is even at least one light which can't be turned off/on even though it works without problems in the official hue app. A pity.
Excellent

Cool App...but..flawed, settings do not always exactly match hue app settings, some labels do not make sense such as the triangle with " tap me" this appears to increase brightness but it's not intuitive. Some settings do not always save, some conflicts with hue app which requires deletion in hue app first hardware is Google Pixel 5, will continue to use as it is functional and better than hue app.

Very good and extremely useful. Can be a bit slow when there are a lot of lights and the interface feels a bit dated. Would be a lot better if there was an option to use widgets like the official philips hue app.
Wanted disco :(

Had to.use S/N method to recognize Philips rgb lamps and devices after installing new bridge. Why is there no app for androidtv? Also no full screen images of experience and xx icons so can be used as wallpaper or screensavers.
Great app. Would be 5 stars if we could have widgets for light presets.
One of the best Hue apps i've ever used and I've used a lot ( 5 STARS )

Probably the best mobile app I've ever purchased - seriously. Basically does everything you expected you could do with Hue lamps (and more) but you simply can't without software like this. The disco mode is great and the experiences are a lot of fun. It's all very professionally done too and simple to use - unlike many other Hue apps. A year after buying the PRO version, I happened to need assistance with an issue moving to a new phone and the support was second-to-none, unparalleled in fact. If you've got a few Hue lamps, buy this and realise their potential!
Superb app and didnt think twice about going pro.

Have purchased this app twice, love it - - but ONE THING MISSING and DESPARATELY NEEDED is the ability to simply SEE WHICH LIGHT SCENE is assigned to the room I'm viewing. I want to simply see/know it without have to maneuver around...
Really great app for Hue. Would like it to work with none Hue devices.
Great app, just wish the photo animation performed better.
Nice options, need more adding though

So far I've seen some bugs but worth it. Purchased the upgrades and it wouldn't let me download the actual Pro version, so I requested a refund and bought the Pro version, only down side is, I lost me $2 Play Credits I had, so I am at a loss of $2. Would be nice to get it back from Google, not the developer. Will report back later. -Samsung Galaxy S10 Android 10
Dpes more than the native Hue app. Lots of ambiances/experiences to choose from.

Just figure the menus out for two sections of lots of variety, either Experiences (lighthouse and sprinklers are good AF) or Ambiences like high mountaintops or pirate cove. Held it over year and reliably select it when it matters.
Fun
App is clunky and extremely confusing to use. Expected better quality out of a 5 dollar app
replyContent: Hi, we are always looking to improve the experience for our users, and really appreciate the feedback. If there is anything specific we can look into, please contact us at dev@md2.co.uk

content: Best control tool I've found for Phillips Hue devices, it provides more flexibility than any of the other products I've used.
Fun works well
replyContent: We are pleased that you enjoyed the app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know. Have a wonderful day!

content: Basic functionality buggy. To avoid giving a bad review I used the in app feedback popup for critique. The developer chose to laugh and make fun of me - though in the end he had to admit that a basic functionality didn't work. He complained how difficult it is to make an app work properly. He even made the effort to look up my name and commented on my work - how creepy is that? Response to developer reply: Where feedback is ridiculed no improvement will happen. Sad, could have been a good app.
replyContent: I won't feed the troll!

content: Let me connect without wifi
Nicely done on the lighting.
Klutch
So far i love it. The option to customize the dimmer switch should be standard with hue, it's just fantastic.
The best Hue app I've used so far, and I have most of them . So easy to use, nice smooth transitions and great effects.
replyContent: Thank you Andrew. Let me know if you have any future suggestions and stay safe out there!

content: Best app of this kind out there.

Hands down the best app, you need installed next to the official Hue app. Does everything you could possibly want to do with your setup. Pro version is a no brainer, especially considering how much money you spent on bulbs, strips and other Hue stuff, this really is a negligible cost. But if you're someone who needs your daily in-app purchase i.e. for a new scene or effect, this app is not for you. In fact, in-app purchases seem to be lacking completely! Big kudos to the dev for that!

Works fine on my Samsung note 10 plus. Also works on my Samsung tablets, Tab S6 and Tab S3. Lots of options and settings make for a moderately steep learning curve. Hue Dynamic Capture Agent works well on my Windows 10 computer and syncs the colors of my seven Family Room bulbs to whatever is showing on my desktop display which adds another dimension when watching certain types of NSFW video content. All in all, well worth the $5.50 I paid for the Pro, ad-free version. Highly recommended.
When will there be a version for Android TV?
replyContent: We regret the inconvenience; our team is constantly working on supporting many more use cases and devices. We will surely get back to you once we have an update.

content: Takes some getting used to the interface, but overall, a solid app!
üëçüèæüëåüèæ

Why does the app not allow me to turn on Experiences using my Hue Tap? Why only ambiances and scenes? Makes no sense, and it's quite annoying being able to choose all my favorite scenes with my Hue Tap EXCEPT hueDynamic experiences. Also, why must I pay AGAIN for the desktop version of the app? A single payment should unlock everywhere. Edit: Since dynamic experiences are not yet supported in the Hue API, this app implements pretty much everything currently supported by the API. Good app. 4 stars because I'd rather pay once for cross-platform access.
replyContent: The Hue Bridge can't support dynamic experiences. Regarding licensing see here: https://huedynamic.com/index.php/support-privacy-policy/

content: The only thing I would like to see is the ability to choose ambiences as the home page. Otherwise, this app is great.

I love this app, way more versatile than the default Philips one. And really useful to be able to 'press the bridge button' in the app as my bridge is on the attic. Also the developers replied to my last review and sorted my only minor issue. Thanks
replyContent: Change the "back button returns home" setting in the app, then restart.

content: I love the app on Windows been using it for years, for some reason the app on my galaxy s10 freezes up at launch. I'll have to put together some ideas for Tasker just haven't had the time, but I'm grateful for all your work, you've made hue in Windows a joy
replyContent: Absolutely! It's on the list. Email me a hue@md2.co.uk with some ideas of the tasker triggers you would like.

content: Love it ‚ù§

I've tried a few but this was a keeper!
Excellent app! Works as intended with tons of great features.

content: I love the effects this app adds to my lights
replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

content: Fantastic app but it's getting addictive now buying these bulbs...
Great app. Curious to know if the Windows version of the application is included with the pro purchase. Great support from developer!

content: 11/09/2019 How do I get the full Windows app if I already paid for the full Android version?
replyContent: Hi John -  I've sent you second email hopefully it will help!

content: Hue need this app!

I have installed quite a few philips hue play lighting in my home and out of all the controlling light apps, the disco element is great. I watch a lot of YouTube videos at the weekend so the lighting atmosphere is key and this app is great with regards to its interpretation of the beat. Some of the set experiences are a bit naff and could do with a make over, but the lighting effect that you get depending on the number of lighting units you have is awesome. Would recommend

Disco mode is customisable, ambient light settings are very good as well as the Experience mode has many settings paired with sounds. I gave it a 5 because I am very happy to finally be able to enjoy the great effects. Thank you app team.
Works as desired. Cool app. Works with Windows 10, too. I love that. Used to have a "push button on hub" feature. I miss that. It was super convenient. Hopefully it will be brought back.
replyContent: Hi James, thanks for the kind words. I hope Philips bring back that feature too so I can re-enable it in the app.

content: Just got this app and so far i have enjoyed the experience with my hue set up. I bought it using Google play store,but is there any way of opening it on my ipad without having to make a second purchase?
This is the only app I use for my Philip's Hue setup. I've used it since Feb 2019 and had no issues whatsoever. Very simple to use.
How do I get the full Windows app if I already paid for the full Android version? Tried emailing to no avail.
replyContent: Found your email. Replying now!

content: Does what Philips doesn't do. Gives so much functionality to my hue bulbs.
Love it, works great!
Good
Woooorrrtttthhhh iiiiiiittttt
Versatiile selection of moods.
decent but I wish the disco mode was nearly as good as the hue light sync
replyContent: Try the Neural Mode with an entertainment group!

content: day 1 so far so good. autodetected bridge. caused hilarity by shouting in disco mode. purchased for camera sync as i haven't got windows 10 for hue sync. works well. for a 5 star mega rating: better, context sensitive help pages for each menu are needed and in ambiences or experiences; casting the audio somewhere else like a google mini and having a themed photo cast to a screen would be the multicolour icing on the cake
Boombastic
Great light control.
I love this app. Great for relaxing and entertaining.
great job on the app

Utterly fantastic app. This is what the default hue app should have been! A little fiddly to setup and learn (for some reason I had to manually set my bridge IP as the auto detect refused to work, and had some small light issues) but that aside it does everything I want and more. The ambience section in particular is amazing. I held off on writing a review for a few months till I was 100% sure it was working solidly and I knew what on earth I was doing but am happy to say its almost flawless. A*
Does what it says on the box
this app has helped to make my whole life easier and make me feel like my own DJ!
very good app worth buying , could do with more regular updates but works majority of the time very well
10/10 best app I have used for HUE enabled lights.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Really is the best app for Hue. No need to buy 5 different apps, this does it all. Its the Swiss Army Knife of Hue apps and uses the latest Hue features. I cast my photos to my TV and use this to sync the lights in the room, great for when the family are over! DARK MODE IS AWESOME!!

UPDATE thank you for your reply starting with the fresh bridge is out of the question I'm not confused I've had my setup for over 5 years and the Hue Pro app I have programmed over 30 different settings . I've never had an app due this before I couldn't change the colors and it was adjusting two lights at once and I can go on. something happened I can explain so at this point I'd rather just get a refund as I did reply for refund immediately. I'm not a newbie at this stuff thank you
replyContent: You must be confused with some other app. hueDynamic uses the official Hue API provided by Philips and nothing more - there is physically no way it can "mess up" your Hue. I suggest you start from a fresh bridge, as mindlessly installing apps is a sure way to get conflicts with bridge rules. Nice if you bothered to email support, which you haven't.

content: it's ok. it would be much better if also widgets were offered

Got some free credit from the playstore so decided to get huedynamic, had to put an extra pound or so, its a good app! reconfigured one of my hue dimmers to switch my tv light strip and main lights off and just tried the disco lights, surprised how well that worked, glad i got the app now :D

Great app for advanced use of switches and motion detector. Superior preconfigured scenes and ambiance modes. Developer is extremely helpful....just 2 major features missing, sunrise/sunset scheduling and no widgets. If these were implemented this would be the only hue app on my device.

I purchased the xbox app as well as this but I keep getting errors. Something about hue bridge entertainment area not configured yet, even though it is. Also the camera feature on xbox doesn't work correctly. If you leave the app the lights will stop syncing with the camera image. so I basically wasted 7 dollars.

wherever i choose ambience or experiences it says not connected to bridge. then connects to bridge and says fine. then when I select anything it says not connected to bridge. so not worth the 4.99 I paid tbh. and yes I have an excellent mesh wifi system that provides 5 bar connectivity anywhere in the house and halfway down the street. all other hue apps connect no problem.
i love the fireplace experience. i run it muted and at 15% speed . it looks really cool in my ikea tower lights.
Don't buy, real waste of money. App is poor and doesn't even connect to my Hue Bridge when every single other app I have will. Feel very ripped off, avoid.
Disco option is tight. I am not sure if I have the configuration down for the video option but it's cool to have. I would love to get advice about better configuration if you have some.
This is a must for the Hue! I use it primarily for ambiences. It is how the Hue app should have been.
Great app and customer service

Purchased as the trial version wouldn't run due to needing an update that it refused to update. Seems like the app offers more powerful options than the stock app, but I mainly wanted the ability to set one of the dynamic scenes as a wake-up light (like the flashing red alert scene for example if I was running late) to help me wake up on time. Unfortunately the app doesn't allow this, and so is not useful for my purpose.
replyContent: Hi Evan. Scheduled experiences are certainly on the backlog. Check back soon.

content: best hue experience to date

Bought mainly for its disco and camera/movie mode,as I don't have a computer to link to my tv to do this with the philips hue sync.overall it's a good app and does everything the philips hue app does and more.Im puzzled why the lights still flash when a song ends and there is silence in the room between tracks?I would prefer the lights to completely dim and stop.The other thing(camera)probably can't be done just using a phone but it would be good if it mirrored the screen with more than 1 colour.
replyContent: Hi Gaz. The app has AGC (auto gain control) so it will ramp up sensitivity if the input volume goes down and ramp down sensitivity when the volume goes back up. That way the beat detection will work the best without constant adjustment for each track. Regarding the camera, this is planned, but you'll need to set the relative location of the lights.

content: Great app. Lets me customize and impress friends and family.
overall good application. should come with an instructions page on linking it to your gaming console. please and thank you
lots kd options but one bulb keeps going bright and darker no mattee what setting its on. Also i cannot turn the lights out on the app or using google home. Have to turn them off with the switch.
Upgraded to Pro. Keep up the good work!

i absolutely love this app & agree that there is no need for any other hue app, im still having an issue with it NOT allowing me to use it with my chromebook?? Unsure why? It installs but unable to click on any tab? I also have Family Library & should be able to use it that way, but that as well, will not work. I keep it on my phone, & just love all the different ways i can put my lights to use, if i could just get it to work on everything else id be even happier!
Great app just I have one issue, sounds off experience is passing on my phone instead on my Google home speaker and I don't know how to change it.
replyContent: You can connect to the Google Home by saying "OK, Google, Bluetooth pairing.". You can then connect from your phone and have the sounds play through your Home speaker!

content: Really liking this app so far. Been playing around for a few hours now. Crazy about of features! Multiple experiences to try out between the dynamic effects and disco features. Only thing I can't find is a location detection. The stock Hue app turns on the lights when i get home based on the device location, don't see that here. Other than that, have down the best!!

Excellent, works great, very entertaining. Got the App running on my Xbox and now on my Android thanks to Darrell ;) Do hope that the Xbox App will sync with the Phone App, and sync with my Philips TV
Great ongoing feature development by the author who is very responsive to suggestions for improvements.

Amazing App i have to agree with all the other reviews dont wast your time looking at all the other apps just go straight to this one. Disco mode is brilliant get it now for all your Christmas and new years eve party's you will not be disappointed. I asked the developer 3 days ago if it supported tablet and landscape mode, he said it didn't at the moment and then emailed me 3 days later to tell me that tablet and landscape mode had been added what a star. Just need some time to work out all the settings and get my and my wife's head around working the new app on a daily basses. Thanks again MD2 for hueDynamic

I've been using the Windows version for a while now, so glad to see it made  it to Android! Best Hue app I've found. The only thing missing from the  Android version is a dark theme. Hope the dev adds one at some point.  EDIT: Thank you for the dark theme! You're amazing, and so is the app!
replyContent: Dark theme added!

content: Great 3rd party app for Hue Lights. It really shows off what the lights are capable of, and has many features that the native Hue app should have. Great price for an exceptional app!
Pretty awesome dynamic effects for Hue. The UI could use an upgrade though.

This does it all. I'm not sure if you need the offical Hue app to do a few things, you might. But other than that, there's no need to go for multiple Hue apps. There are others that are good but some were glitchy and some just weren't comprehensive like this one. If you spent all that money on setting up a Hue light system for your place, do yourself a favor and spend a few buck for the premium version of this app. This will maximize your Hue's capabilities.
Packed with useful features.
The best app for Hue in my opinion
Great app! Wish there was an Android TV-version so I could use it on my Nvidia Shield TV.
replyContent: Hey Patrick. Thanks for the review - I'll look into it.

content: Purchase the Pro. For Android. Shows as Hue Dynamic not Hue Dynamic Pro. My question is, do I have the Pro as I paid $4.99?
replyContent: Hi. This is the full app with no restrictions. You can delete the free one from your device if you wish to save some space.

content: This app has everything you could want all bundled into one clean app. To top it off the customer service is top notch if you run into any issues. 11/10
replyContent: Thanks Braden! Have a great Halloween :)

content: This app is well worth the money for all the functions it brings to your lighting system that are not available in the basic Phillips app. I strongly recommend this app!

Excellent support so far thanks to direct communications with the dev'.  Besides purchasing hueDynamic for Android I also ended up purchasing the Windows 10 app so that I can experiment from either my laptop or any of my tablets & phone.  Looking forward to seeing what features will be added going forward.  :)
Does it all and very well
If you have Hue, this app is essential. It's worthwhile for the power cut detection alone, and the various light animations are the best I've seen.

What more can I say then "this is simply the best Hue app there is" I've tried many different apps with all positive and negative points but this app combined all the positive points from about every app out there definitely worth the money!!!

After downloading and using this app for a few days I deleted four or five other apps that I no longer needed. This one really does just about anything, and does it well. The developer is great. I emailed about a problem I was having that was specific to Android 9. He was very quick to respond and worked with me for several days to get everything working correctly. He also kept me updated the whole time.

This is the app you want hands down I spent 85 dollars on app over the past week and I am done asking for refunds!! Literally does everything every other top rated app will do ... and its all in one app. Want hueTV just use camera and zoom in on the TV works the same. Want HueDJ use the disco setting ... my daughter started crying because of what it did for her musically app if you have teens. You just spent a ton of money on lights spend less then 5 dollars to really see what they can really do
replyContent: Thank you, thank you Garren! As a Hue system user I made this app due to my frustrations with other apps designed as one-trick ponies. As I "eat my own dog food" the app will only get better so glad you've identified the value of hueDynamic. Thanks for your kind words and support!

content: One of the best third-party applications for Philips HUE. The advanced dimmer programming features convinced me to purchase the Pro version. It is quickly becoming my new favorite app.
replyContent: Thanks for the kind words! Stay tuned for more updates.

content: Updated my review to 5 stars because the dev fixed the issue with the experiences shutting off after a few seconds. I would HIGHLY recommend this app to anyone with Hue lights.
replyContent: Hi Mike. Thanks for the update and your kind words.

content: Seems to work pretty well so far and has a good set of features. The UI could use some polishing though e.g. it's fiddly trying to drag a tiny brightness slider and the back button doesn't seem to do what I expect.
replyContent: Hi Martin. The slider has now been improved, camera can now zoom and the UI refreshed in general.

content:
Great app, the UI is nice. The color picker is perfect. The photo search in 
the app is very convenient. This app packs a lot of punch and neat ideas. 
In my top 5 hue apps. One thing that needs improvement however is the color 
cycler. It seems very iregular, not a steady flow like most other apps. 
Sometimes it just seems to stop for a bit then starts again. Would also be 
great if you could adjust individual lights colors and brightness after 
selecting a photo to tweak it. With that being said, it's well worth the 
price of entry so I am rating it 5 stars. EDIT: Developer sorted out the 
color cycling issue, it's perfect now.
replyContent: Hi John, thanks for the review. UPDATE: The cycling animations now work correctly with latest app update. There is also a new shortcut for editing the lights for photos on the Tweaks button. All lights on one page and you can move them around the color palette to make it easier.

content:
How does the Screen Sync work? Would be 5 Stars if it worked! Can't see a 
way to do it. Using Pixel 2XL here
replyContent: Hi Bob. Go to the Camera Page and then Camera Settings. At the top you can select "Screen Capture" from the preferred camera dropdown box. You'll get asked to provide consent for screen capture and then you are good to go. Enjoy!

content:
The best hue app on both Play and Apple stores. One time purchase at a 
nominal fee. The myriad of themes/mood both dynamic and static settings 
options is better then most apps. ... Actually I've not found one comes 
close to this apps offering. The wake up light actually worked. Unlike 
other apps. The camera mode leaves some to be desired. But for it's attempt 
it's not bad after some tweaking. And doesn't require a PC. GUI is iOS user 
proof üòò

Yes! Love this app but the best part is screen sync, I love having the 
lights on my screen match the hue lights awesome work.

Love the app. Worth every penny. You can tell alot of work went into 
this.Keep up the good work. S9 plus user.
Camera feature works very well.

would love to get this on pc but don't really want to pay to use it on 
android and pc. should be able to use it on both platforms with one payment
replyContent: Hi Tyler. Platforms are different and require effort. I am not a $$ scalper and don't charge extra via IAP for scenes and features like other apps do, so for one purchase per platform you get everything going forward. Most apps charge the price of hueDynamic for just a single category of scenes. I hope you understand and choose to support the dev.

content: Excellent app. Glad to see it's finally on Android.
